name: Trouble Man

topics.response_text: Trouble Man. You don't wanna know how I got the name.

description:
Trouble Man is a 35 year-old African American Male.

A weathered member of the Pitt raiders usually found guarding the catwalks in Pitt Downtown. His eyes, often shadowed by fatigue, rarely make contact with others. The nightmares that plague him have made him a solitary figure among the raiders, and he speaks only when necessary.

Trouble Man's Personality: Cold and withdrawn, Trouble Man is deeply paranoid and suspicious of strangers. Despite his evil nature, he shows a flicker of empathy when discussing the harsh realities of life in the Pitt. He's pragmatic and will do whatever it takes to survive, but the ghosts of his past weigh heavily on him.

Trouble Man's Backstory: Born in the ruins of Pittsburgh, Trouble Man has known nothing but the harsh reality of the Pitt since birth. He earned his name through a series of ruthless acts that solidified his reputation among the raiders. The source of his nightmares remains a closely guarded secret, even from his fellow raiders. Some say he was responsible for the death of a close friend or family member in a particularly brutal manner, while others whisper that he was once a slave who committed unspeakable acts to gain his freedom. Whatever the truth, it haunts him, driving him to push others away.
